title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: Critical Thinking Development Through Anatomy Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Anatomy Terminology and Understanding of Human Body Structure
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can connect anatomical structures and functions by analyzing real clinical scenarios
Learners can structure problem-solving processes (problem definition → hypothesis setting → data research → solution derivation) and create presentation materials through PBL team activities
Learners can write and revise anatomical problem-solving reports reflecting peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
